title: The strategic use of AI in the public sector: A public values analysis of national AI strategies
research_description: The article analyzes national AI strategies and how they position the use of AI within the public sector, using a public value framework. It focuses on the strategic priorities and dominant discourses identified in 28 national AI strategy documents.
research_results: The study identifies three dominant discourses: empowerment through information, enhanced administrative practices, and improved service delivery. These discourses reflect how governments prioritize AI applications in different public sector domains, including health, social care, and employment.
future_research: Further research could investigate how these national strategies impact the actual implementation of AI in public organizations and explore the long-term societal implications of AI in governance.
